Product Description

Are You Troubled by Acne? Do you always use your fingers to squeeze acne?

Please stop using your fingers to squeeze the acne!

Use our BLACKHEAD REMOVER TOOLS to squeezing the acne.

Our professional 5Pcs Pimple Popper Tool Kit included 10 heads,One set for acne treatment.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.99 - $7.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:06:24 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Tip:

If the pimple is immature, it is an inflamed pimple that feels stubborn and a little painful. Please do not use any extractor, it will make things worse, wait for the acne to mature and use it.Facial redness, when using makeup remover tools to press the skin, so the face will be partially red after use, but it will all disappear in a short time, no need to worry.Tools that are not sterilized before use or contaminated with skin bacteria may cause acne marks to persist.So wipe with alcohol before and after each use, and always remember – be gentle!

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer â : â No

Date First Available â : â December 12, 2019
Manufacturer â : â MENOLY
ASIN â : â B082NTWYXY
Country of Origin â : â China

Applicable Skin: Our pimple extractor set is fit on all types of skin, like sensitive face, oily skin, dry skin, especially suitable for acne skin.
Safe Material: The professional blackhead extractor is made of needle stainless steel coating and the anti-slip handle won’t cause allergic issues.
Package: 10 pcs professional blackhead remover tools with a leather case, convenient to store and carry which is suitable in your cosmetic bags or bathroom.
Precaution: we suggest to use the blackhead remover after the acne ripe enough, and please wipe all tools with rubbing alcohol before and after each use. Tip: Please refer to the instruction manual presented by us for the specific operation method.

Read more

Tip:

  • If the pimple is immature, it is an inflamed pimple that feels stubborn and a little painful. Please do not use any extractor, it will make things worse, wait for the acne to mature and use it.
  • Facial redness, when using makeup remover tools to press the skin, so the face will be partially red after use, but it will all disappear in a short time, no need to worry.
  • Tools that are not sterilized before use or contaminated with skin bacteria may cause acne marks to persist.
  • So wipe with alcohol before and after each use, and always remember – be gentle!

4.5
